title: Can Imaginary Play Be Unhealthy?
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: The parent of a 5-year-old girl and 2.5-year-old …
itunes:summary:
The parent of a 5-year-old girl and 2.5-year-old boy describes their play as generally creative and happy, but she sometimes observes what she believes is “manipulative behavior and unkind talk during disagreements.” This mother is wondering if it’s appropriate to intervene and correct what she perceives as unhealthy behavior, or whether it’s just part of their personal and social development.
